com.alvermont.terraj.util.io
Class PrintUtilities

java.lang.Object
  com.alvermont.terraj.util.io.PrintUtilities
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.print.Printable
public class PrintUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.print.Printable

Code for printing Swing Components. Originally obtained from: http://www.developerdotstar.com/community/node/124. Minor mods by me for log4J and exception handling - MS.

Version:
$Id: PrintUtilities.java,v 1.3 2006/07/06 06:59:43 martin Exp $
Author:
Rob MacGrogan

print

public int print(java.awt.Graphics g,
                 java.awt.print.PageFormat pf,
                 int pageIndex)
Print the component into a graphics context

Specified by:
print in interface java.awt.print.Printable
Parameters:
g - The Graphics object to be used for printing. This should be a Graphics2D instance
pf - The page format to be used
pageIndex - The number of the page being printed
Returns:
An indication of whether the page existed. Silly people using magic numbers. Oh well.
